videos.title: Lofi hip hop radio - beats to relax/study to
videos.description: Thank you for listening, I hope you will have a good time here

videos.title: Chill study live stream - pomodoro timer | 25min focus blocks
videos.description: Welcome to the new study stream! Study productively with Taiki by following the Pomodoro Technique to effectively manage your time  :)

videos.title: Rainy Night ~ Lofi Coffee ~ Lofi Music deep focus to [ Study-Work ]
videos.description: As raindrops patter gently against the windowpanes, seek refuge in the cozy sanctuary of Lofi Coffee...

videos.title: Música clásica tranquila | Bach, Mozart, Vivaldi...
videos.description: Esperamos que estas piezas de música clásica hagan que sus noches de verano sean más agradables y le devuelvan una sensación de paz interior y calma.

videos.title: Erik Satie - Gymnopédies & Gnossiennes
videos.description: These short, atmospheric pieces are written in 3/4 time, with each sharing a common theme and structure.

videos.title: Piano Background Music, Study and Work Music, Cafe Music
videos.description: Música de fondo al estudiar, al trabajar, música de fondo de cafetería, calma, naturaleza.

videos.title: Sonidos de Lluvia y Truenos: Sonidos de la Naturaleza para Dormir, Relajarse, Estudiar
videos.description: En este video podrás disfrutar de ocho horas de sonido de lluvia relajante con truenos suaves, perfecto para dormir y relajarte.

videos.title: Cozy Tranquil Beach House - Peaceful Beach Waves & Soothing Fireplace
videos.description: Imagine yourself in a cozy coffee shop by the coast, the rhythmic waves lapping at the shore and the gentle patter of rain providing a calming background.

videos.title: Lakeside Ambience - Crackling Fire, Crickets, Winds and Distant Thunder
videos.description: Hope you have a pleasant time. Heal your mind with Golden Hour.
